system.effect: The energy ripples all over the character, scorching his body with horrid third-degree burns. The target suffers [[1d10]] levels of Fatigue, and can only take a Half Action on his next turn.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Body (Severity 4)

The energy ripples all over the character, scorching his body with horrid third-degree burns. The target suffers [[1d10]] levels of Fatigue, and can only take a Half Action on his next turn.
